author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sharp showers, accompanied by heavy wind, were reported in many parts of Kanyakumari district on Wednesday night.

Kottaram experienced rain for over half-an-hour on Wednesday night. Nagercoil, Myladi, Aralvoimozhi, Kannimar, Surulode, Puthananai, Pechiparai, Perunchani dams also received rain.
title: Rain in Kanyakumari
